languages.text: {n}Сметя предыдущие символы волной живого металла, плита являет вам новые. Их свечение прорезает мрак гробницы, болезненно впиваясь в глаза.{/n} "Владыка, зрю истину о таинстве биопереноса — отвержении праха телесного, душу нашу терзаньем расторгнувшего и обречение совершившего нас на триумфальную вечность. Посланник Их воплотился к Владыкам Владык, и даровал триумф непогубности. Плата за то обещана не была, но явствовала. Отказ дан не был, дары свершились".

traits.locale_text: {n}Сметя предыдущие символы волной живого металла, плита являет вам новые. Их свечение прорезает мрак гробницы, болезненно впиваясь в глаза.{/n} "Владыка, узри истину о таинстве биопереноса — предательства праха телесного, душу нашего народа терзаньем расторгнувшего и обречение совершившего нас на триумфальную вечность".

languages.text: {n}A wave of animated metal sweeps away the symbols, and the slab shows you a new set. Their glow cuts through the crypt's darkness, making your eyes sting.{/n} "My Lord, I behold the truth of the rite of Biotransference: the renouncement of our decay-bound bodies, the soul-splitting agony that doomed us to an eternity of triumph. Their messenger manifested among the Overlords of Overlords, bearing the gift of triumphant indestructibility. No fee had been promised, yet a fee was to be paid. There came no refusal, and the gifting was done."
languages.original_text: {n}Сметя предыдущие символы волной живого металла, плита являет вам новые. Их свечение прорезает мрак гробницы, болезненно впиваясь в глаза.{/n} "Владыка, зрю истину о таинстве биопереноса — отвержении праха телесного, душу нашу терзаньем расторгнувшего и обречение совершившего нас на триумфальную вечность. Посланник Их воплотился к Владыкам Владык, и даровал триумф непогубности. Плата за то обещана не была, но явствовала. Отказ дан не был, дары свершились".

traits.locale_text: {n}A wave of animated metal sweeps away the symbols, and the slab shows you a new set. Their glow cuts through the crypt's darkness, making your eyes sting.{/n} "My Lord, I behold the truth of the rite of Biotransference: the shedding of our decay-bound bodies, the soul-splitting agony that doomed us to an eternity of triumph. A messenger was sent by Them, and was incarnated among the Overlords of Overlords, bearing the gift of triumphant indestructibility. No fee was promised therefor, yet the fee was manifest. There came no refusal, and the gifting was done."

languages.text: {n}Una ola de metal animado barre los símbolos y la losa te muestra otros cuya luz atraviesa las tinieblas de la cripta y hace que te escuezan los ojos.{/n} «Mi Señor, he contemplado la verdad del rito de la biotransferencia: la renuncia a nuestros cuerpos decadentes, la agonía que dividió nuestras almas y nos condenó a una eternidad de triunfos. Su mensajero se manifestó ante los señores supremos de los señores supremos ofreciendo el don de ser indestructibles y triunfales. No se había prometido pago alguno, pero el pago se produciría. No hubo rechazo alguno y el regalo se produjo».
languages.original_text: {n}A wave of animated metal sweeps away the symbols, and the slab shows you a new set. Their glow cuts through the crypt's darkness, making your eyes sting.{/n} "My Lord, I behold the truth of the rite of Biotransference: the renouncement of our decay-bound bodies, the soul-splitting agony that doomed us to an eternity of triumph. Their messenger manifested among the Overlords of Overlords, bearing the gift of triumphant indestructibility. No fee had been promised, yet a fee was to be paid. There came no refusal, and the gifting was done."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una ola de metal animado barre los símbolos y la losa te muestra otros cuya luz atraviesa las tinieblas de la cripta y hace que te escuezan los ojos.{/n} «Mi Señor, he contemplado la verdad del rito de la biotransferencia: la renuncia a nuestros cuerpos decadentes, la agonía que dividió nuestras almas y nos condenó a una eternidad de triunfos. Su mensajero se manifestó ante los señores supremos de los señores supremos ofreciendo el don de ser indestructibles y triunfales. No se había prometido pago alguno, pero el pago se produciría. No hubo rechazo alguno y el regalo se produjo».

languages.text: {n}Une vague de métal animé balaie les symboles pour en faire apparaître de nouveaux. Leur lueur perce l'obscurité de la crypte et vous brûle les yeux.{/n} « Mon seigneur, je vois la vérité du rituel de biotransfert : la renonciation à nos corps putrescibles, le tourment qui déchire l'âme et nous a condamnés à une éternité de triomphe. Leur messager s'est manifesté parmi les seigneurs suprêmes, apportant le don triomphal de l'indestructibilité. Aucune contrepartie n'avait été promise, mais il était évident qu'il y aurait un prix à payer. Puisque personne ne s'y est opposé, le don a été accepté. »
languages.original_text: {n}A wave of animated metal sweeps away the symbols, and the slab shows you a new set. Their glow cuts through the crypt's darkness, making your eyes sting.{/n} "My Lord, I behold the truth of the rite of Biotransference: the renouncement of our decay-bound bodies, the soul-splitting agony that doomed us to an eternity of triumph. Their messenger manifested among the Overlords of Overlords, bearing the gift of triumphant indestructibility. No fee had been promised, yet a fee was to be paid. There came no refusal, and the gifting was done."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une vague de métal animé balaie les symboles pour en faire apparaître de nouveaux. Leur lueur perce l'obscurité de la crypte et vous brûle les yeux.{/n} « Mon seigneur, je vois la vérité du rituel de biotransfert : la renonciation à nos corps putrescibles, le tourment qui déchire l'âme et nous a condamnés à une éternité de triomphe. Leur messager s'est manifesté parmi les seigneurs suprêmes, apportant le don triomphal de l'indestructibilité. Aucune contrepartie n'avait été promise, mais il était évident qu'il y aurait un prix à payer. Puisque personne ne s'y est opposé, le don a été accepté. »

languages.text: {n}脈動する金属の波がシンボルを洗い流し、平板は新たなシンボルを見せる。その光は地下室の暗闇を貫き、目を突き刺す。{/n}「主よ、私は生体転移の儀式の真実を目撃しました。それは腐るべき肉体の拒絶であり、永遠の勝利を運命付ける、魂を裂く苦痛でありました。オーヴァーロード中のオーヴァーロードの間において勝利の不壊性の贈り物を携え、彼らの使者は顕現し、報酬は約束されてはいませんでしたが、結局は払われることとなりました。拒絶される箏なく、贈呈されたのです」
languages.original_text: {n}A wave of animated metal sweeps away the symbols, and the slab shows you a new set. Their glow cuts through the crypt's darkness, making your eyes sting.{/n} "My Lord, I behold the truth of the rite of Biotransference: the renouncement of our decay-bound bodies, the soul-splitting agony that doomed us to an eternity of triumph. Their messenger manifested among the Overlords of Overlords, bearing the gift of triumphant indestructibility. No fee had been promised, yet a fee was to be paid. There came no refusal, and the gifting was done."

traits.locale_text: {n}脈動する金属の波がシンボルを洗い流し、平板は新たなシンボルを見せる。その光は地下室の暗闇を貫き、目を突き刺す。{/n}「主よ、私は生体転移の儀式の真実を目撃しました。それは腐るべき肉体の拒絶であり、永遠の勝利を運命付ける、魂を裂く苦痛でありました。オーヴァーロード中のオーヴァーロードの間において勝利の不壊性の贈り物を携え、彼らの使者は顕現し、報酬は約束されてはいませんでしたが、結局は払われることとなりました。拒絶される箏なく、贈呈されたのです」

languages.text: {n}金属板上面的符号迅速消失，一组新的符号显现其上。符号发出的明光驱散了墓穴中的黑暗，让你的眼睛刺痛不止。{/n}“我的主，我看到了生物质转移仪式的真理。我们将放弃腐朽的身体，承受灵魂分裂的痛苦，走向注定永恒的胜利。他们的信使出现在无数霸主之间，带着胜利的赐福与坚不可摧的承诺。他们没有要求付出任何代价，但我们必将付出代价。没有任何人拒绝他们的赐福，就这样，所有人都得到了赐福。”
languages.original_text: {n}A wave of animated metal sweeps away the symbols, and the slab shows you a new set. Their glow cuts through the crypt's darkness, making your eyes sting.{/n} "My Lord, I behold the truth of the rite of Biotransference: the renouncement of our decay-bound bodies, the soul-splitting agony that doomed us to an eternity of triumph. Their messenger manifested among the Overlords of Overlords, bearing the gift of triumphant indestructibility. No fee had been promised, yet a fee was to be paid. There came no refusal, and the gifting was done."

traits.locale_text: {n}金属板上面的符号迅速消失，一组新的符号显现其上。符号发出的明光驱散了墓穴中的黑暗，让你的眼睛刺痛不止。{/n}“我的主，我看到了生物质转移仪式的真理。我们将放弃腐朽的身体，承受灵魂分裂的痛苦，走向注定永恒的胜利。他们的信使出现在无数霸主之间，带着胜利的赐福与坚不可摧的承诺。他们没有要求付出任何代价，但我们必将付出代价。没有任何人拒绝他们的赐福，就这样，所有人都得到了赐福。”

languages.text: {n}Eine Welle belebten Metalls wischt die Symbole fort, und die Tafel zeigt dir einen neuen Satz. Ihr Leuchten durchschneidet die Dunkelheit der Krypta und lässt deine Augen schmerzen.{/n} "Herr, ich sehe die Wahrheit des Ritus des Biotransfers: die Widersagung unserer verfallgebundenen Körper, die seelenzertrümmernde Pein, die uns zu einer Ewigkeit des Triumphs verdammt hat. Ihr Bote hat sich zwischen den Hochlords der Hochlords manifestiert, die Gabe der triumphalen Unzerstörbarkeit bringend. Kein Preis war versprochen worden, doch ein Preis war zu bezahlen. Es kam keine Ablehnung, und die Schenkung wurde vollzogen."
languages.original_text: {n}A wave of animated metal sweeps away the symbols, and the slab shows you a new set. Their glow cuts through the crypt's darkness, making your eyes sting.{/n} "My Lord, I behold the truth of the rite of Biotransference: the renouncement of our decay-bound bodies, the soul-splitting agony that doomed us to an eternity of triumph. Their messenger manifested among the Overlords of Overlords, bearing the gift of triumphant indestructibility. No fee had been promised, yet a fee was to be paid. There came no refusal, and the gifting was done."

Es kam keine Ablehnung, und die Schenkung wurde vollzogen."

languages.text: {n}Harekete geçen metalden yayılan dalga, sembolleri süpürüyor ve tabaka sana yeni bir dizi gösteriyor. Parıltıları mahzenin karanlığını yarıp gözlerini yakıyor.{/n} "Lordum, Biyoaktarım ayininin gerçeklerine nail oldum. Çürümeye mahkûm bedenlerimizden, bizi başarıyla dolu bir ebediyete mahkûm eden ruh parçalayıcı ızdıraptan arınıyor. Ulakları, muzaffer yok edilemezlik armağanı ile Efendilerin Efendilerinin arasında peyda oldu. Hiçbir karşılık vadedilmedi ancak yine de bir karşılık ödenecekti. İtiraz gerçekleştirilmedi ve armağan alındı."
languages.original_text: {n}A wave of animated metal sweeps away the symbols, and the slab shows you a new set. Their glow cuts through the crypt's darkness, making your eyes sting.{/n} "My Lord, I behold the truth of the rite of Biotransference: the renouncement of our decay-bound bodies, the soul-splitting agony that doomed us to an eternity of triumph. Their messenger manifested among the Overlords of Overlords, bearing the gift of triumphant indestructibility. No fee had been promised, yet a fee was to be paid. There came no refusal, and the gifting was done."
